feed.title: An "app store" and non-network transaction fees

entry.title: An "app store" and non-network transaction fees
entry.summary: A v1 API has been released for an idea presented on the BitcoinTalk forum. The announcement was made by Wendell, who stated that there are currently no fees and only basic features available. Mike Hearn responded to the announcement, expressing interest in the idea. Contact information for grabhive.com, Twitter, and a GPG key were also provided.
